BSC.desc: CheersLand is a scalable GameFi Metaverse Aggregator where anyone can monetize their gaming experiences and social networks and let games earn diversified rewards through skill-based gameplay and contributions to the ecosystem. This is GameFi-as-a-Service (GaaS) Model, driven by Play-to-Earn and Build-to-Earn mechanics with the product portfolio of Gamified Launchpad, Multi-game Universe, Multi-asset Staking Platform, and NFT Market. CheersLand is owned and governed by $CHEERS Holders.
